titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 98-513 to provide for the inheritance of small fractional interests within the Lake Traverse Indian Reservation.
Lake Traverse Reservation Heirship Act of 2007
Lake Traverse Reservation Heirship Act of 2007

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

bill.summary: Lake Traverse Reservation Heirship Act of 2007 - Amends federal Indian law to provide for the inheritance of small fractional interests within the Lake Traverse Indian Reservation.
